entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Double Page Declaration Causes Object Reference Not Set Error #39270
  • Blazor WebAssembly hot reload support broken when changing environment from Development #39269
  • Perf improvement: updates #39268
  • When hosting as Windows Service, Singletons are disposed AFTER the Service has reported to be stopped #39264
  • Perf improvement: plaintext_netty #39262
  • SPA proxy stop script fails to run due to incorrect line endings #39261

Closed

  • Adding Microsoft.AspNetCore.Identity.UI to .Net 6 Blazor Webassembly Shared project causes build Error #39263
  • Snapshot debugging encountered error of a referenced type which isn't available #39267
  • [Breaking change]: Microsoft.AspNetCore.Server.Kestrel.Transport.Libuv and Libuv.dll removed from 7.0 #38022
    Discussions

PullRequests

Merged

  • Fix typo in xml comment in GetMultipartBoundary method #39266
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1
  • chore : Remove unwanted `using` statement #39176
    area-mvc, community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • Added API analyzer functionality for conditional return expressions #39242
    area-mvc, community-contribution
